1132.content:
Over 1,000 years ago, a Mobian was born who could go into the famed Super form without the Chaos Emeralds. This being changed the world. Now, another such being rises....
Sonic was in trouble. He and his friends were getting the worst beating they had ever gotten. thanks to Metal Sonic. As he raised his hand, the machine heartlessly blasted Tails, wounding him badly, and crushed Sonic's arm. "I think the bratty girl will go next, don't you, Sonic?" Amy, who was hurt herself, suddenly started pulsing with a strange power. "You ruthless, heartless..you will PAY for this!" A green sphere seemed to surround her, as she exploded with power. (OOC: See this link to get the idea:http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=eVPYgzt1_X8&feature=related .) When the sphere faded, Amy had changed into....
1132.title: Amy Rose: the Legendary Super Mobian

Instead on the lean girl he was used to, he saw a very tall woman, about 6 feet at least, with muscles that looked like they'd make bodybuilders blush, and curves to die for. (OOC: Link to my idea of how this'd look: http://muscle82002.deviantart.com/art/Amy-Rose-65347409 ). "Amy you're..GORGEOUS!" Amy smiled, and said...

1151.content:
Sonic and friends had defeated Dr. Eggman yet again, and were enjoying a well-earned break. Amy was exploring Angel Island, having heard of the mysterious place from Knuckles.
Breaking a boulder with her hammer, she saw a gleam of red light. "Hey, it"s a Chaos Emerald!" exclaimed the pink hedgehog, picking it up. The shiny red rock glowed, and a crimson aura enveloped her. "What the heck?! she exclaimed.

13.title: Cream the Rabbit

132.content:
Cream stared up at the night sky through her bedroom window and sied. It would be hard to argue that Cream hasn't grown up into a fine young woman. She was the picture of femininity graceful poised and ... Slight. Cream had the physique of a wet noodle and that didn't do you much good when you and your friends were regular the attacked by killer robots. Cream keenly felt her own uselessness in battle as she was frequently the damsel in distress and be saved by her friends.

She was distracted from her moping by a shooting star streaming across the sky.
"I wish I could be stronger." Cream said quietly before she decide to turn in for the night unknowing that when she woke up in the morning she would find herself...
132.title: Wishes on a star

choices: She went jogging to burn off the energy.
She went downstairs to show her mother her change.
Her physique wasn't the only thing changed.
1321.content:
Cream woke up the next morning feeling strange, energized but strange. Getting out of bed and looking into her mirror she realized why this was. She looked very different, she was taller to start at least a couple inches. Her arms and long legs had taunt wiry muscles giving her a physique like a professional runner. Brushing her hand across her stomach she felt her abs.
"Wow I've gone from a china doll to an action figure overnight." Cream said as she stretched in front of the mirror admiring her physique. As she looked at herself she felt energy building up inside her.
1321.title: Lean and athletic

13211.title: She went jogging to burn off the energy.

14.content: How does the lovely kitty grow?
14.title: Blaze the Cat

142.content:
Blaze gave a soft sigh, as she wiped some sweat from her forehead. Another day, another attack by Nega, and another day of training for her. Looking around the wreckage of Negas bots, she shook her head.

"There must be an easier way to deal with this..." She whispered, as she began to head back to her SOL gems altar. Arriving back there, she gently moved her hands trough one of the SOL gems, "How I wish there was a easier way for me to be strong and protect my gems...."

As she said those words, the gems suddenly began to glow and pulsate, which made Blaze raise her eyebrow. Before she could say, a strange flash occurred, as she felt something traveling into her. When the flash died down, everything seemed fine, but the emeralds looked a little dim in color. Blinking again, Blaze looked around and then saw herself. Which drew her eyes was her chest, which was usually flat and yet now actually showed up a little, not to mention she noticed that her arms toned up and bulked up a little, the indication of that being that her blouse was a little ripped up, exposing her purple fur.

"W-W-What in the world..." She whispered, her eyes wider as saucers as she flexed her bicep a little.
142.title: The Sol Emeralds affect her differently than no...

choices: goes off to wrestle/kill with sonic and friends
go show off her muscle to friends
144.content: Blaze the cat thinks about how it is getting harder and harder every day to fight Eggman naga. as she walks and thinks on this problem she spots a potion off to the side of the path. seeing it she picks it up and reads the label "if ye need strength drink" thinking that she might as well try it she takes a drink. as she does she immediately feels overwhelming power flowing through her as her muscles started to swell. her legs became muscular curved legs of destruction powerful enough to break a boulder. her pecs swelled to a massive 15" and ripped through her dress revealing her undergarments. her stomach flattened into powerful a 8 pack of abs. and her biceps swelled to become strong 20" peaks. as she flexes her biceps she thought about some fun ways she could use this new found strength.
144.title: She drinks a potion.

152.content: How does this raccoon become more muscular?
152.title: Amazon of the seas.

1522.content:
We join coon girl on one of her favorite hobbies, which was treasure hunting. Specially since she recently got a map that indicated that a large booty was awaiting for her on a deserted island nearby, usually she'd ask Blaze to accompany her. But, today the purple feline was extremely busy, so Marine set out herself. Studying the map, she steered the ship towards it's destination, which luckily wasn't far away. Once she arrived, she made her way to land.

"Let's seee...According to the map, it should be nearby..." She murmured, making her way trough the thick jungle "Mmm...Some sort of temple?"

Once she stepped out, in the center of the island she did see a temple with what seemed like remains of a village around it. Making her up the stairs, inside the temple she saw an old statue depicting a rather muscular looking female wearing a strange jewel around her neck. Cooing with delight, Marine then carefully approached said statue as she removed the jewel.

"Well, well look at this lovely booty" marine murmured, tossing it in her hand "I'm sure you'll fetch me a good price and maybe a much bigger ship~"
1522.title: A strange jewel (not a Chaos Emerald) effects her.

15221.content:
All of a sudden, Marine felt a sharp jolt of... something. She was caught off guard by this, and her curious mind began to wonder what it was. Was it pain, she thought? No, felt too good. Pleasure? Nah, too painful. Definitely a strong hint of power, though... She continued to ponder the strange sensation and bean to raise her arm to scratch her head, when something else caught her attention. She didn’t lower her arm down to look at it, however... mainly because it was her arm.

To be specific, it was her bicep. It had been surprisingly toned for someone her age(which, at this point in time, is thirteen), but now it had gotten bigger. At least twice, maybe thrice as big. “Crikey,” she said to nobody in particular. She unflexed her arm and, surprisingly, the bicep didn’t shrink down. Quite the opposite, in fact- it appeared to grow even more. She flexes again, and it grew even more. “Holy Dooley,” she said as her voice began to deepen and a wide smile formed across her face, “I’m built like a brick s**t house!”

What? That’s how they say it down in Australia.

She turned her attention to her other arm, which was just as big. She then looked at the muscle lady statue, and read the text below:

ALL WHO WIELD THIS AMULET WILL BE GIVEN THE RAW POWER OF BELLONA

“Bellona, eh?” Marine puzzled. “That’s the sister of Mars, god of war!” For a thirteen year old, Marine was one smart cookie. “That weird feeling was definitely power, then. Speakin’ of which, I can still feel it. Except it’s getting stronger...” Her voice continued to deepen. “...which must mean I’m getting stronger!” She checked out her new body in a nearby reflective surface that can easily be used in a mirror.

I’m feeling lazy today.

Marine was now about seven feet tall and totally massive. One bicep- unflexed- was about as tall as her head, and still growing. Her chest, also still growing, consisted of two layers- hard, solid pecs, and comparatively soft, round breasts. Between the both of those, they were bigger than even her unflexed single bicep- though not as big as her combined flexed biceps. Her dress had, strangely, not ripped. Neither did her pants, although both of them were extremely tight, showing off definition quite nicely. They had not changed size, either, resulting in her dress stopping at a point to leave her abs- a very prominent six pack which was morphing into an even more prominent eight pack- uncovered, and her pants stopping mid-thigh, showing off her legs- which were twice as big as her arms and still growing. They appeared to be getting smaller, although in reality, Marine was just growing. The most striking feature, however, was her eyes- they had turned from a sky blue to a deep purple.

Marine smiled at her newfound muscles and either didn’t notice or care about her new eye color. “Oh, yeah,” she said as her voice continued to deepen. “Gimme MORE...” Her muscles began to grow even faster, and purple veins began to appear on her biceps. Her back flared out like a cobra’s hood, and her eight pack started to become a ten, then a twelve pack. “Nngh... oh, yeah, that’s the stuff...” She grunted and growled as her growth accelerated and her voice got deeper still. Her traps exploded with muscle, as did her shoulders. “Grr... yes... YES...” Her neck expanded, deepening her voice further, as the purple glow of her eyes and veins intensified. “YES!!!” she boomed in a very deep and loud- but still feminine and definitely Australian- voice. “I am woman, HEAR ME ROAR!” She did a crab flex and roared as...
15221.title: Gotta Grow Fast

choices: Head to a store for a clothing update.
152211.content:
her growth suddenly doubled, making the small coon become more of an Amazonian looking goddess. Her biceps and muscles pulsated with power and raw strength, as Marine felt all this go through her body and simply making her drunk.

"Hahahah! WHAT A RUSH!!" She yelled out in the same deep voice, as she punched a nearby wall.

Smirking at how she pretty much went through it like paper, the now-massive coon kissed her pulsating bicep as she began to leave the temple with her prize in her hands. Her movement is a tad more seductive, especially in her hips as she reached her ship. Well, it was now smaller for her size, but she thought she could still stir it without having the poor thing fall into pieces,

"I better ask Blaze for a bigger boat after this..." She thought, getting on the ship.

Thankfully, it held out just enough for her to reach the shores of Blaze's kingdom. As she made her way through the streets, everyone was looking at her massive and muscular body, with Marine just drinking in all that attention that was making her feel intoxicated once more with her even striking a few poses. But, she had to keep her mind clear and get to her destination which was...
152211.title: ...she grew even faster,

choices: ...gave into her urges and put it on.
1522111.content:
As she approached Blaze’s castle, she reluctantly put the amulet in her pocket(which she had in this world), willing and able to unveil it and put it back on at any time. She flexed her muscles- which had stopped growing at this point- and then cleared her mind as she entered the castle.

Many people stared at Marine’s new size, and she felt the intoxicating need to show off once more. She gave off a few flexes to the inhabitants, and then she approached Blaze’s throne. “Queen Blaze-” yes, Blaze is a queen in this world- “I know this may come off as bizarre, but I might need a new boat. It’s not that I don’t love my old one-” practically salivating as the word love forced her to think of her muscles and how much she loved them- “but I’m afraid it’s simply... how do I put this... too small for me.”

Queen Blaze’s mouth stood agape as she saw Marine’s new size. “I should think so! How’d you get so big so fast?”

Marine smiled and pulled out her amulet. “This here,” she said, “is the amulet of Bellona, the Roman goddess of war. All who wield it will be given her power.” She felt tempted to put it on, but tried to remain formal in front of the Queen. “Would you like a demonstration?”

Blaze simply nodded, and Marine...

15221112.content:
Reluctantly Marine slowly extended her hand towards Blaze, practically fighting urges to pull it back. Accepting the trinket, Blaze studied it carefully before putting it on, the moment she did she felt a strange rush of energy hit her body. Marine just grinned, noticing the glow in Blazes eyes while the strange energy surrounded her.

"Ooo..oo..T-This..P-Power..mmhhpp..S-Such a rush!" Blaze moaned, feeling her muscles starting to grow.

Marine's grin became wider, as she watched the felines muscles grow along with her breasts. Blaze growled, getting rather intoxicated on this magical energy, as her clothing began to grow tighter and strain, with some ripping happening here and there. Giving a roar, she flexed her biceps as her blouse ripped some more which made Marine squee with joy.

Blaze meanwhile growled and flexed as she kept on growing until...
15221112.title: ...reluctantly gave it to Queen Blaze.

choices: ...put on the amulet and worry about clothes later.

152211122.content:
Blaze took the amulet off when she got to Marine’s size, reluctantly. “I don’t know where you found this,” she said in a deeper voice, “but it works wonders! And yes, that boat will be yours.”

Marine squealed with delight. “Oh, thank you, thank you, THANK YOU!”

Blaze gave the amulet back to Marine. “I believe this is y-yours...” She didn’t wanna give it back, but Marine found it first. “W-where did you find it?”

“Oh, this weird island thing. When the new boat gets made, I’ll take you there,” Marine responded. “I have a feeling that if there’s another amulet just like this one, you might want it yourself.”

“Sounds like a plan,” Blaze agreed. “Now, go forth. I shall alert you when it is ready.”

Marine smiled and exited the castle. While she was impatient and couldn’t wait for the boat, she decided that whining about when it will be done won’t do any good- a rare moment of maturity.

Now here came the tricky part- how would she occupy herself? She looked at the amulet. It’s power was so alluring, and she wanted MORE of it. But then she looked at her clothes. They weren’t ripped yet, but they looked like they were about to give out any second. She didn’t wanna look indecent, after all. Eventually, she decided to...

1553321.title: NICOLE

15533212.content:
It was not a dark, stormy night- quite the opposite, in fact, it was a bright, sunny afternoon- but it might as well have been for NICOLE the Holo-Lynx. NICOLE, or Nicole as we’ll format it, was feeling incredibly down recently. Her software had become increasingly buggy, her holographic form kept glitching out, and in some cases, she even crashed. For the life of her, however, she couldn’t understand why. “I better plug myself into the computer and see what’s up,” she muttered. She teleported to the base(as best as she could) and plugged herself into the giant computer in the wall. On the screen was a lone message in green:

“Obsolete system deteriorating due to age. Would you like to upgrade? Note: Personality, physical appearance, and memories will be kept intact.”

The digi-lynx thought for a total of five seconds- which would normally be considered a long time for her, but was a record for her aging processor- and tried to manipulate the cursor using her mind to click “Yes”. Unfortunately, she had to glitch out. The green message closed, with a new message in red taking its place:

“SYSTEM DETERIORATION CRITICAL. INITIATING EMERGENCY UPGRADE. APPEARANCE WILL BE ALTERED AS A RESULT. PERSONALITY MAY BE ALTERED AS A RESULT. MEMORIES WILL NOT BE ALTERED AS A RESULT.”

A strange surge of power came over the cyber-lynx as her body began to glow bright blue. “What’s happening to me...?” she pondered to herself. A meter came up on the screen reading 0%. As the meter filled up, Nicole’s muscles began to expand. Initially, she was frightened, but as she grew bigger and bigger, she felt herself enjoying the change more and more. She growled and flexed as the upgrade continued. “I a, Nicole,” she shouted. “Hear me roar!” She gave off a savage roar as her growth accelerated and her veins began to glow white. She couldn’t tell if her personality was changing as a result of the upgrade or whether this was her real thoughts, but one thing was for sure- she didn’t want it to stop.

Eventually, once the meter reached 100%, she...
15533212.title: System Upgrade

choices: She becomes a massive Amazon AI at 200%

As if granting her wish, the giant computer continued sending the needed data through her body. With each growth, she felt a new rush of power and intoxication going through her entire body. Grunting and growling, the power-hungry lynx flexed her massive biceps and each of those movements sent another wave of pleasure through her.

"YESS!!! YESS!!! WATCH MY MIGHT FORM! AHAHAH! WATCH AND KNEEL BEFORE IT!!" She roared louder at the top of her lungs.

Growing bigger and bulkier, Nicole felt her outfit grow tighter but it didn't rip and instead showed more of her curves and bulk, her massive chest bounced, while the sound of stretching and the groaning fabric was like music to her ears. Her legs, thighs, and hips bulged with power. All this was such a new experience to her, that she didn't want it to stop as the numbers were still going as by now she was at 150% and still going up, as Nicole continued to bulk up further and further.

She grinned in ecstasy, her whole body assaulted with pleasure a AI shouldn't be able to experience. Well, the Sonic girls don't get much love for FMG(female muscle growth). This'll hopefullyfix that.
My rules are simple: Focus on FMG, though other stuff is allowed! That is all.
